Why Hire 1000 Calls a Day Instead of a VA Caller?

 Mar 21, 2018

Mar 21, 2018

All of the advantages you get from hiring us instead of a VA caller add up to you having more time to call leads and grow your business.

Why use 1000 Calls a Day instead of hiring a VA caller directly? Your decision ultimately depends on your situation and your budget, but there are certain advantages that come with hiring us and letting us handle the process from start to finish.

While weâre certainly not the cheapest, if you go to a site like Upwork.com or another virtual assistant site and hire a caller for $5 to $8 an hour, youâll have to train that person, put all the technology in place, manage the campaigns, handle all of the troubleshooting, etc. Itâs a vigorous, frustrating process, and it can take you away from your core competency and your most important revenue-producing activities. Itâs our job to take that off your plate and help you generate leads.

The first advantage is we can go out and get better talent for you. We have full-time recruiters out there looking at 200 to 400 resumes a day. We test our VAs to make sure theyâre legitimate, and we bring them up to speed with our testing processes. You donât have to do any training either. We take care of all the scripts and campaigns ourselves.

Second, we take the risk of losing an employee off your plate. Oftentimes, you can hire an employee, train them, spend a ton of time with them, only to have them leave in a couple months and make you start all over again. We, on the other hand, can replace the VA should they decide to leave.

âWe take other tasks and processes off your plate so you can focus on calling leads.â

Additionally, we manage that VA for you. We have one supervisor for every 10 callers we manage, so our supervision of the caller involves helping them with the analytics and making sure theyâre doing the right things. Our supervisors are also listening in on calls and giving the callers feedback and coaching on how to improve.

Finally, and perhaps most importantly, you get a whole team of people. In addition to the caller and the supervisor, you get access to our executive staff who have a lot of experience managing outbound calling campaigns. Itâs important to be able to put the data and/or prospects into the system and write or tweak the scripts, but what happens if the campaigns arenât performing? We have over 100 callers weâre currently managing, so we can look at the exact same campaigns with other people around the country and compare your results. If your results arenât meeting our expectations, we know that something needs to change, and we have the expertise to do that.

Our goal is to get you 40 to 50 pre-qualified leads on a monthly basis so you can convert those leads into more business and make more money.

If you have any further questions about how we can put an outbound prospecting campaign in place an help you grow your business, donât hesitate to reach out to us. Weâd love to speak with you.

    • 2 Ways To Improve Your Campaign
    • Federal Telemarketing Laws
    FCC regulations prohibit telemarketers from using automated dialers (i.e. Mojo) to call cell phone numbers. We remove them from your list and call them on a standard phone line without a dialer. We also remove everyone who is registered on the DNC list who you do not have an existing business relationship (up to 3 months after last inquiry).
    TCPA
    United States Code, 2011 Edition
    Title 47 - TELEGRAPHS, TELEPHONES, AND RADIOTELEGRAPHS
    CHAPTER 5 - WIRE OR RADIO COMMUNICATION
    SUBCHAPTER II - COMMON CARRIERS
    Part I - Common Carrier Regulation
    Sec. 227 - Restrictions on use of telephone equipment
    Restrictions on Telemarketing, Telephone Solicitation, and Facemile Advertising (TCPA Rules)
    Telemarketing Sales Rules (TSR)
    If you ask for phone numbers on your website as an opt-in requirement (and you/we plan on calling them with an autodialer) you must get express consent on the opt-in form.
    Opt-In Requirement Language:

    Yes, I want to receive special offers! By clicking the "SUBMIT" button below, I expressly authorize ___[SPECIFIC COMPANY NAME(S)]___ to call me or send me recorded messages or texts about their products and services using automated technology to my telephone/cellular number I entered immediately above. I understand that I am not required to consent in order to purchase.

    (SUBMIT BUTTON)

    For record-keeping, make sure to capture IP address, time and date stamp, and screenshot (or similar) showing exactly what consumer saw when they consented. Store all this so you can immediately produce for a regulator or court upon request. Burden of proof for consents is on the caller. The consumer merely has to allege they did not consent, and then you will be required to prove consent occurred.
